title: Thursday Pt2: Super Bowl picks; Fantasy sensei Adam Rank; Packers S Adrian Amos; Survival picks
itunes:title: Thursday Pt2: Super Bowl picks; Fantasy sensei Adam Rank; Packers S Adrian Amos; Survival picks
description:
Part two of the Good Morning Football Podcast starts with Super Bowl predictions from Jamie Erdahl and Kyle Brandt. Next, hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty are joined by Packers safety Adrian Amos and he talks about competing against Aaron Rodgers in practice, the new look wide receiver core taking on a larger role, being overlooked nationally, and facing Justin Jefferson on Sunday. Later, they’re joined by fantasy sensei Adam Rank and he shares which WR this weekend will rule their craft, the RB with the most favorable matchup, and which QB will hit all their targets. Part two of the podcast finishes up with survival week picks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Part two of the Good Morning Football Podcast starts with Super Bowl predictions from Jamie Erdahl and Kyle Brandt. Next, hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty are joined by Packers safety Adrian Amos and he talks about competing against Aaron Rodgers in practice, the new look wide receiver core taking on a larger role, being overlooked nationally, and facing Justin Jefferson on Sunday. Later, they’re joined by fantasy sensei Adam Rank and he shares which WR this weekend will rule their craft, the RB with the most favorable matchup, and which QB will hit all their targets. Part two of the podcast finishes up with survival week picks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
